CustomField.formula: if ( Combined_Largest_Gift_Amount__c = LargestAmount__c , Largest_Gift_Date__c, if ( Combined_Largest_Gift_Amount__c = Largest_Soft_Credit_Amount__c , Largest_Soft_Credit_Date__c , Largest_Partial_Soft_Credit_Date__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date of the largest gift received from this Account (includes hard, soft, and partial soft credit gifts). Based on NPSP rollups.
CustomField.label: Combined Largest Gift Date
